key_risks: Market volatility and revenue dependency on trading volumes
Regulatory and compliance risks from global regulators
Cybersecurity threats and vulnerabilities in third-party tools
Intense competition from traditional exchanges and fintech disruptors
controversies: Technical glitches, such as the 2021 Facebook IPO trading delay
Role in the GameStop trading frenzy raising concerns about market integrity
social_issues: Concerns about retail investor protection during high-profile trading events
governance_issues: Regulatory scrutiny and potential legal risks from compliance violations
Exposure to reputational risks from enforcement actions
